items.content_html: The To-Do List is a simple web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help users manage tasks efficiently. It allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, with a dark mode toggle for a better experience. The app is lightweight and works seamlessly on all devices.
items.title: Vasu10134/to-do-list: The To-Do List is a simple web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help users manage tasks efficiently. It allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, with a dark mode toggle for a better experience. The app is lightweight and works seamlessly on all devices.

items.content_html: The Chat App is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed for real-time customer support chats. It features a clean interface, dark mode toggle, and seamless compatibility across devices, ensuring a user-friendly experience.
items.title: Vasu10134/chat-app: The Chat App is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed for real-time customer support chats. It features a clean interface, dark mode toggle, and seamless compatibility across devices, ensuring a user-friendly experience.

items.content_html: An interactive 2D raycasting simulation built with TypeScript and HTML5 Canvas. Features real-time player movement, customizable maps, and dynamic field of vision rendering. Lightweight and perfect for learning raycasting basics
